description: This file implements the worker functions for the Http Simple Proxy Object, handling connection acceptance, removal, query processing (sync and async), send completion, and event notification. It contains functions that manage socket connections and proxy session interactions in a HTTP proxy context.

methods.name: BOOL HttpSpoPubwoAccept(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PANSC_HANDLE phClientContext)
methods.description: Handles the acceptance of a new server connection, allocates a buffer descriptor, and sets buffer context for the socket.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPubwoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket)
methods.description: Removes the server connection, cleans up associated session and client socket contexts, releases resources, and performs necessary cleanup tasks.

methods.name: ULONG HttpSpoPubwoQuery(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,PANSC_HANDLE phQueryContext)
methods.description: Handles incoming data from the client side, queries the session for server interaction mode, and adjusts processing mode accordingly.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPubwoProcessSync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Processes data synchronously, forwarding or processing data based on the session state and mode, managing socket states appropriately.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPubwoProcessAsync(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,PVOID buffer,ULONG ulSize,ANSC_HANDLE hQueryContext)
methods.description: Asynchronous processing stub, does not perform actual processing in this implementation.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPubwoSendComplete(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved,ANSC_STATUS status)
methods.description: Handles completion notification of data send operations; implementation is a stub returning success.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSpoPubwoNotify(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hSocket,ULONG ulEvent,ANSC_HANDLE hReserved)
methods.description: Notifies the proxy object of socket events such as errors, closure, resource issues, timeout, and handles cleanup or session updates accordingly.
